summary: A couple invites a Count from Hungary, who recently immigrated to America, to conduct a seance for the woman's recently deceased mother, oblivious to the fact that he is actually a vampire.
cast: Robert Quarry|Roger Perry|Michael Murphy|Michael Macready|Donna Anders|Judy Lang|Edward Walsh|Julie Conners|Paul Hansen|Sybil Scotford|Marsha Jordan|Deborah Darnell|George Macready|Erica Macready|Mark Tapscott|Stella Thomas
keywords: 1970s|female vampire|character name as title|count yorga character|low budget film
title: Conde Yorga, vampiro
